content.rendered:
Directed by S Krishna. Rudresh M. Gowda.

Written by S Krishna. Siri. Mayank Jain.

Cast V. Ravichandran(Sathyamoorthy (as Crazy Star V. Ravichandran)). Sudeep(Captain Ram (as Abhinaya Chakravarthy Kechchedeya Kichcha Sudeepa)). Amala Paul(Dr. Nandini). Ravi Kishan(Amruth Shah). P. Ravi Shankar(Arasikere Anjanappa). Kabir Duhan Singh(Kabir). Kaveri(Anuradha Sathyamoorthy). Chikkanna(Dr. Sundar). Avinash(ACP Prathap). Anil(Gym Guy with Tattoo). Ravi Kale(Colonel Murali Menon).Ashwin. Vihaan Rajeev(Commando Tanveer).Akash. Danny Kuttappa(Shivajinagar Fayaz). Prachi R. Naik(Ritu (as Prachi)). Disha Ram(Shankranna’s daughter (as Disha)). Manjunath Hegde(Shankranna (Sathyamoorthy’s driver)). Ravindranath(Dr. Ravindra). Sarovar Sanjeev(School Teacher). K. Manju(Business Dealer #1). Umapathy Srinivas(Business Dealer #2). Kari Subbu(Canteen Owner) .Chikkanna.Omkaar. Jasmin Ottenburg(Warrior (Title song)). Md Saykat Ahmed Rayhan(Kabir). Rafsan Rehan(Rajesh)

Languages Kannada. Tamil.

Producers Dinesh Kumar H.S. Rengarajan Jaiprakash. Raghunath. Darshan S.. Umapathy Srinivas.

Production Goldmines Telefilms. S.R.V. Productions. Umapathy Films.
